author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Christian Carlow for "Include Thailand Province Geo data" https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5607
This patch corrects three Thailand provinces added from the previous patch which unnecessarily had the word "PROVINCE" appended end of their names which looks messy.
